mapper.sql: id, logon_name, eff_date, exp_date, last_name, first_name, account_status, sex, phone, email, lst_logon_date, pwd_change_date, password, status, create_date, update_time, create_userid, account_type
mapper.insert:
SELECT FLOOR(REPLACE(unix_timestamp(current_timestamp(3)),'.',''))*10000+FLOOR(RAND()*10000) as id FROM dual
insert into ds_user (id, logon_name, eff_date, exp_date, last_name, first_name, account_status, sex, phone, email, lst_logon_date, pwd_change_date, password, status, create_date, update_time, create_userid, account_type ) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{logonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{effDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{expDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{firstName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sex,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lstLogonDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{pwdChangeDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{accountType,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )

mapper.update:
update ds_user
logon_name = #{logonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
eff_date = #{effDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
exp_date = #{expDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
last_name = #{lastName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
first_name = #{firstName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
account_status = #{accountStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lst_logon_date = #{lstLogonDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_userid = #{createUserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
account_type = #{accountType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update ds_user set logon_name = #{logonName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, eff_date = #{effDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, exp_date = #{expDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_name = #{lastName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, first_name = #{firstName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account_status = #{accountStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lst_logon_date = #{lstLogonDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, pwd_change_date = #{pwdChangeDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_userid = #{createUserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, account_type = #{accountType,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where id = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: SELECT dfp.name parent_name,dfp.url parent_url,dfc.name,dfc.url FROM ds_function dfp LEFT JOIN ds_user_function duf ON dfp.id=duf.function_id LEFT JOIN ds_function dfc ON dfp.id=dfc.parent_id WHERE duf.user_id=#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
